title: Spacious 2-Bedroom At Mylo! Now Offering 6-Weeks Free | Lease Today!
posting_body: ['Virtual and Self Guided Tours Available!', 'Use the link in this ad to visit our website for more information or contact us via phone or email.', 'Welcome to Mylo Santa Clara', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 6', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1113 Sq.', 'Ft.', '#3611 - 12-Month Lease Term, $3889', 'Mylo Santa Clara in Santa Clara, CA, is conveniently situated amid shopping, dining, and entertainment options, and with its proximity to leading tech employers, like Apple and Intel, this apartment community is your ideal Silicon Valley destination for “Life in Sync.”', 'The community is comprised of one- and two-bedroom floor plans, including 15 townhome-style residences.', 'Each home is finished in contemporary style with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, and hardwood-style vinyl flooring.', 'The spacious interiors include conveniences like a fully equipped kitchen and an in-home washer and dryer.', 'Select residences also enjoy a private patio or balcony to extend your living space outdoors.', 'Just outside your door, a variety of vibrant social spaces complement your home.', 'Breathe in the fresh air in your choice of six uniquely themed courtyards, or from our one-acre greenway with a playground and dog park.', 'Soak up the sun on our rooftop deck with 20,000 square feet of amenity space featuring a club room, fitness center, multiple BBQ areas, fireplace, and pool and spa.', 'Our pet-friendly community also boasts spaces for movie watching, pet washing, coworking, and more.', 'Step outside our grounds and grab a coffee or a bite to eat at your choice of several nearby restaurants and cafés.', 'Perhaps best of all, our location offers quick access to highways 280 and 101, as well as the Lawrence and San Thomas expressways ensuring that the Bay Area’s iconic attractions are always within easy reach.', 'Features:', 'Gourmet Kitchen with Quartz Countertops, In-Unit Washer & Dryer, Dual Pane Windows, Dishwasher and in-sink Disposal, Full-Height Tile Mosaic Backsplash in Kitchen, Hardwood-Style Vinyl Flooring, Stainless-Steel Appliances, 15 Live/Work Townhouses (Lofts!), Walk In Closets in most homes, A/C and Heat, Patio/Balcony in most homes', 'Community Amenities:', 'ADA features, Community courtyard, Shared workspace, Controlled access, Extra storage space available, Courtesy patrol, Elevator, Dog park, Clubhouse, Sauna, Spa, EV charging stations, Swimming pool, Pet friendly, Online resident portal, 24/7 emergency maintenance, Bike maintenance station, BBQ area, LEED certified, Outdoor firepit, Dry cleaning services available, Conference room, Fitness center, Recreation room, Bike storage', 'Pet Policy', 'We allow cats and dogs but limit 2 pets maximum per home.', 'We love all pets, but the following breeds/crossbreeds are not allowed: Pit Bulls (Staffordshire Bull Terrier), Dobermans, Rottweilers, Chow Chows, German Shepherds, Huskies, Mastiffs, Great Danes, Malamutes, Akitas and Wolf Hybrids.', 'Restrictions subject to change without notice.', 'Monthly Pet Rent: Cats $50 / Dogs $75', 'Deposit: $500 (for up to 2 pets)', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>']
